title: End or cancel a reservation
content:
You can end or cancel a reservation with the following methods.

Method 1: end or cancel a reservation through Reservation

To end or cancel a reservation through Reservation: 

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Service Asset & Configuration.

  2. From SACM Home, select Reservations.

  3. Select the reservation record you want to end or cancel.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter  button. For more information, see Filters.

  4. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  5. Select End or Cancel from the drop-down list on the top right corner of the General tab.

  6. Click   Save on the toolbar.

Method 2: end or cancel a reservation through Service Request 

To end or cancel a reservation through Service Request: 

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Service Request. Service Management displays the list of service requests.

  2. Select the request record that you want to edit.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter  button. For more information, see Filters.

  3. Click the record identifier in the Id column to display the selected record, or click Edit.

  4. Click the Reservation tab.

  5. In the Reserve assets section, select the reservation.

  6. Click Actions, then Close or Cancel, as required.

    • A reservation is closed when the reservation is completed. For example, the reserved asset has been checked out of the stockroom and is in use.

    • A reservation is canceled when the reservation is no longer required. For example, when the reserved asset isn't checked out from the stockroom by the end of the reservation period.
